models.name: First Principles Thinking
models.description: Breaking down complex problems into their most basic, foundational elements and reasoning up from there.
models.example: Elon Musk used first principles to reduce the cost of rocket launches by building reusable rockets.

models.name: Second-Order Thinking
models.description: Considering the long-term and indirect consequences of decisions by thinking in terms of 'and then what?'
